duties.title: Know Your Cyber Security Program
duties.content:
Know Your Cyber Security Program

The Cyber Security Program is located ….

POTENTIAL ISSUES

Not knowing where our Cyber Security Program is located. You might be asked in an audit.

duties.title: Review Program Annually
duties.content:
Review Program Annually

The IS&C will annually update the Cyber Security Program and may request your review of portions of the Program.

POTENTIAL ISSUES

Not performing requested reviews in the timeframe required.

duties.title: Know Your CIP Senior Manager
duties.content:
Know Your CIP Senior Manager

Your CIP Senior Manager is Daniel Froetscher, SVP Transmission, Distribution & Customers.

POTENTIAL ISSUES

Not knowing the name of our CIP Senior Manager. Dan's a really nice guy and you definitely don't want to hurt his feelings. Plus an auditor might ask you.

duties.title: Create Evidence of Your Duties
duties.content:
Create Evidence of Your Duties

Always provide the information the IS&C and Regulatory teams request, follow every documentation step in our processes, and make sure you mark your tasks as done.

POTENTIAL ISSUES

Not maintaining evidence to document your duties

duties.title: Be Aware
duties.content:
Be Aware

The IS&C will post posters and other awareness material on a quarterly basis. Read, watch and be enlightened.

POTENTIAL ISSUES

Removing awareness materials. We know they're cool, but you can't take them home to hang in your bedroom.
